text: The 2016-17 season is Ludogorets Razgrad's sixth season in A Football Group, of which they are defending Champions. They will also take part in the Bulgarian Cup, SuperCup and enter the UEFA Champions League at the second qualifying round stage. ==Squad== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;
